## Toolbox class

Class for a Toolbox. Creates the toolbox's DOM.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Toolbox extends DeleteArea implements IAutoHideable, IKeyboardAccessible, IStyleable, IToolbox, IFocusableNode 
```
**Extends:** [DeleteArea](./blockly.deletearea.md)

**Implements:** [IAutoHideable](./blockly.iautohideable.md)<!-- -->, [IKeyboardAccessible](./blockly.ikeyboardaccessible.md)<!-- -->, [IStyleable](./blockly.istyleable.md)<!-- -->, [IToolbox](./blockly.itoolbox.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [createContentsContainer\_()](./blockly.toolbox.createcontentscontainer_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the container for all the contents in the toolbox. |
|  [createDom\_(workspace)](./blockly.toolbox.createdom_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the DOM for the toolbox. |
|  [createFlyout\_()](./blockly.toolbox.createflyout_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the flyout based on the toolbox layout. |
|  [deselectItem\_(item)](./blockly.toolbox.deselectitem_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Deselects the given item, marks it as unselected, and updates aria state. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.toolbox.dispose.md) |  | Disposes of this toolbox. |
|  [getClientRect()](./blockly.toolbox.getclientrect.md) |  | Returns the bounding rectangle of the drag target area in pixel units relative to viewport. |
|  [getFlyout()](./blockly.toolbox.getflyout.md) |  | Gets the toolbox flyout. |

|  [getToolboxItems()](./blockly.toolbox.gettoolboxitems.md) |  | Gets the items in the toolbox. |

|  [onClick\_(e)](./blockly.toolbox.onclick_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Handles on click events for when the toolbox or toolbox items are clicked. |
|  [onDragEnter(\_dragElement)](./blockly.toolbox.ondragenter.md) |  | Handles when a cursor with a block or bubble enters this drag target. |
|  [onDragExit(\_dragElement)](./blockly.toolbox.ondragexit.md) |  | Handles when a cursor with a block or bubble exits this drag target. |
|  [onDrop(\_dragElement)](./blockly.toolbox.ondrop.md) |  | Handles when a block or bubble is dropped on this component. Should not handle delete here. |
|  [onKeyDown\_(e)](./blockly.toolbox.onkeydown_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Handles key down events for the toolbox. |
|  [onNodeBlur()](./blockly.toolbox.onnodeblur.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.onNodeBlur. |
|  [onNodeFocus()](./blockly.toolbox.onnodefocus.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.onNodeFocus. |
|  [onShortcut(\_shortcut)](./blockly.toolbox.onshortcut.md) |  | Handles the given keyboard shortcut. |
|  [onTreeBlur(\_nextTree)](./blockly.toolbox.ontreeblur.md) |  | See IFocusableTree.onTreeBlur. |
|  [onTreeFocus(node, \_previousTree)](./blockly.toolbox.ontreefocus.md) |  | See IFocusableTree.onTreeFocus. |
|  [position()](./blockly.toolbox.position.md) |  | Positions the toolbox based on whether it is a horizontal toolbox and whether the workspace is in rtl. |
|  [refreshSelection()](./blockly.toolbox.refreshselection.md) |  | Updates the flyout's content without closing it. Should be used in response to a change in one of the dynamic categories, such as variables or procedures. |
|  [renderContents\_(toolboxDef)](./blockly.toolbox.rendercontents_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Adds all the toolbox items to the toolbox. |
|  [selectItem\_(oldItem, newItem)](./blockly.toolbox.selectitem_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Selects the given item, marks it selected, and updates aria state. |
|  [selectItemByPosition(position)](./blockly.toolbox.selectitembyposition.md) |  | Selects the toolbox item by its position in the list of toolbox items. |
|  [setSelectedItem(newItem)](./blockly.toolbox.setselecteditem.md) |  | Sets the given item as selected. No-op if the item is not selectable. |
|  [setVisible(isVisible)](./blockly.toolbox.setvisible.md) |  | Shows or hides the toolbox. |
|  [shouldDeselectItem\_(oldItem, newItem)](./blockly.toolbox.shoulddeselectitem_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Decides whether the old item should be deselected. |
|  [shouldSelectItem\_(oldItem, newItem)](./blockly.toolbox.shouldselectitem_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Decides whether the new item should be selected. |
|  [updateCursorDeleteStyle\_(addStyle)](./blockly.toolbox.updatecursordeletestyle_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Adds or removes the CSS style of the cursor over the toolbox based whether the block or bubble over it is expected to be deleted if dropped (using the internal this.wouldDelete\_ property). |
|  [updateFlyout\_(oldItem, newItem)](./blockly.toolbox.updateflyout_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Decides whether to hide or show the flyout depending on the selected item. |
|  [updateWouldDelete\_(wouldDelete)](./blockly.toolbox.updatewoulddelete_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the internal wouldDelete\_ state. |
|  [wouldDelete(element)](./blockly.toolbox.woulddelete.md) |  | Returns whether the provided block or bubble would be deleted if dropped on this area. This method should check if the element is deletable and is always called before onDragEnter/onDragOver/onDragExit. |
